attributes.action: Ensure that one of the two new Aircraft Carriers being built is named HMS Ark Royal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Two new Aircraft carriers are currently under-construction for the Royal Navy.  There names have been selected as HMS Prince of Wales and HMS Queen Elizabeth.  I would like to request that one of the ships be renamed HMS Ark Royal, so that the name Ark Royal continues to live on and be associated with British Aircraft Carriers.
